attributes.name: Aetherial Crown
attributes.magical_effects: Retain effects of the last two Standing Stones selected when equipped

attributes.name: Diadem of the Savant
attributes.magical_effects: Spells in all schools cost less Magicka to cast

attributes.name: Mage's Circlet
attributes.magical_effects: Increases your Magicka by 20-70 points

attributes.name: Ahzidal's Ring of Arcana
attributes.magical_effects: Allows you to cast the Destruction spells Ignite and Freeze

attributes.name: Ahzidal's Ring of Necromancy
attributes.magical_effects: Whenever a creature you have reanimated takes damage, they explode for 50 points of Frost damage and die

attributes.name: Hircine's Ring
attributes.magical_effects: Provides additional transformations for werewolves

attributes.name: Neloth's Ring of Tracking
attributes.magical_effects: When close enough, identifies the source of the ash spawn attacks on Tel Mithryn

attributes.name: Ring of Bloodlust
attributes.magical_effects: While in Beast Form, your attacks do 50% more damage, but also take 50% more damage

attributes.name: Ring of Instinct
attributes.magical_effects: When you enter Beast Form, the world around you seems to slow for 20 seconds

attributes.name: Ring of Namira
attributes.magical_effects: Stamina is increased by 50 points. Feeding on corpses grants you increased Health and Health regeneration.

attributes.name: Ring of the Beast
attributes.magical_effects: While wearing this ring, you will receive 100 extra health and your claw attacks will do an additional 20 damage

attributes.name: Ring of the Erudite
attributes.magical_effects: Regenerate Magicka faster

attributes.name: Ring of the Hunt
attributes.magical_effects: While in Beast Form, your health regenerates

attributes.name: Ring of the Moon
attributes.magical_effects: Increases the duration of your Howls by 25%

attributes.name: Amulet of Dibella
attributes.magical_effects: +15 Speechcraft

attributes.name: Amulet of Talos
attributes.magical_effects: Time between Shouts is reduced by 20%

attributes.name: Amulet of Zenithar
attributes.magical_effects: Prices are 10% better

attributes.name: Amulet of Articulation
attributes.magical_effects: Persuade checks in dialogue will almost always succeed and Speechcraft is 5-35% better

attributes.name: Amulet of Bats
attributes.magical_effects: While wearing this amulet, bats will drain life from any nearby enemies

attributes.name: Amulet of the Gargoyle
attributes.magical_effects: While wearing this amulet, your Summon Gargoyle spell summons an additional gargoyle for 30 seconds

attributes.name: Kyne's Token
attributes.magical_effects: Damage taken from animals is reduced 10%

attributes.name: Necromancer Amulet
attributes.magical_effects: Health and Stamina regenerate 75% slower

attributes.name: Ogmund's Amulet of Talos
attributes.magical_effects: Time between Shouts is reduced by 20%

attributes.name: Saarthal Amulet
attributes.magical_effects: Spells cost 3% less to cast

attributes.name: Shahvee's Amulet of Zenithar
attributes.magical_effects: Prices are 10% better
